scenes.background: Monica frowns and looks at her phone. Bob leans against the wall, sighing.
scenes.description: 'We've tried everything. We really need your help. Can you spare just a little more time?'

options.text: I can step in for a bit longer, but let's set a clear end time.
options.analysis: You offered to extend your help slightly, showing empathy and perception, but your motivation and self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I understand the situation, but I need to prioritize my time off.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the urgency but emphasized your need for rest, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation to help.

options.text: This constant reliance on me is not sustainable. We need a better plan.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, and it might strain your relationship with colleagues.
